alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 7:35AM PST until February 25 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, mainly in the foothills. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Antelope Valley, mainly in the foothills above 3500 feet elevation. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, with the potential for travel delays and possible road closures. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
